name: get-company-info
description:
Retrieve information about the company, as seen in the commerce platform.

This may include information like addresses, tax registration details and social media or website information.

companyId.description: Unique identifier for your SMB in Codat.

connectionId.description: Unique identifier for a company's data connection.

$ul: **accountBalances**: The available and current cash balances for the company's accounts
**baseCurrency**: The currency data type in Codat is the [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217) currency code, e.g. _GBP_.
**commercePlatformRef**: Identifier or reference for the company in the commerce platform
**companyLegalName**: The full legal name of the company
**phoneNumbers**: Phone numbers associated with the company
**registrationNumber**: The registration number of the company
**sourceUrls**: URL addresses for the originating system. For example, potential use cases include 'deeplinking' to the originating system
